issue.title: [Rust] Migrate CI tests to stable rust
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10929](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10929). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
With the merging of https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8698 the parquet writer now supports stable rust and we should be able to run most of our CI checks with stable rust rather than nightly to ensure no more unstable features are added. 

`[~jorgecarleitao]` has started on this – in particular this patch: https://github.com/jorgecarleitao/arrow/commit/ca66d6d945e265dd2c83464bd80ff1dd7d231f7c

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10929?focusedCommentId=17252633) by Jorge Leitão (jorgecarleitao):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8930
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8930>
